.. _SMAPquickstartindex:

Installation & Quick Start
==========================

| This is guide to quickly test the various modules of the SMAP package.  
| Install the SMAP package according to these :ref:`instructions <SMAPinstallationquickstart>`.
| Test data may be downloaded from Zenodo (link).  
| The following sections will be covered by the tests:

| * Installation  
| * Analysis of simulated GBS data  
| * Analysis of real GBS data  
| * Analysis of real CRISPR genome editing data

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   quickstart
